contextId.information: "peace" is described as a living thing that can choose where to stay. AT: "he will have the peace you blessed him with" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: your peace will rest upon him

contextId.information: "peace" is described as a living thing that can choose to leave. AT: "you will have that peace" or "he will not receive the peace you blessed him with" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
"wisdom" is treated as if it was able to speak for God. AT: "God in his wisdom said" or "God wisely said" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
